description.en: A self-styled fortune-telling machine in the shape of a black cat. Riding atop a fat moogle stuffed animal、 he half-forces his way into Cloud's party. Though his behavior is usually comical、 his comments at times show a concern for others. After coming to terms with the danger facing the planet、 he fights to the end alongside his true comrades.
description.jp:
黒い猫の姿をした自称占いマシーン。
デブモーグリのぬいぐるみに乗り 半ば
強引にクラウドたちの仲間となった。
コミカルな言動が多いが ときおり
人々を気づかうような発言をする。
星の危機を知って覚悟を決めると
真の仲間として共に戦いぬいた。

jp.text: ヘイ・ユー！ 暗〜い顔してますなー
求めれば必ず会えます\nしかし 最も大切なものを失います
今までどおり 仲ようしてください
当たるも〜ケット・シー 当たらぬも〜ケット・シー
このボクは ボクだけなんや！
はん！ 確かに聞こえは いいですな！\nせやからって 何してもええんですか？

gl.text: Hey you!! What're you lookin' so down for!?
I don't know if it's good or bad... This's the first time I ever got something like THIS.
So why don't we go on as we did.
Right or wrong、 I'm still the same 'ol me.
Hah! That sure sounds good! So you think you can do whatever you want、 right?

desc.en:
6-HIT AoE melee BRV attack
BRV hits are distributed based on number of enemies
Grants [S Physical Attack Up] for 5 turns

When total party buffs is 3 or more but less than 6:
• [Toy Soldier] becomes [Toy Soldier+]
　∟ Increased potency

When total party buffs is 6 or more:
• [Toy Soldier], [Toy Soldier+] becomes [Toy Soldier++]
　∟ Increased potency compared to [Toy Soldier+]

6-hit group melee BRV attack
BRV attacks distributed based on number of enemies
